channel-type.label: Color
channel-type.description: The color channel allows to control the color of a light. It is also possible to dim values and switch the light on and off.

channel-type.label: Brightness
channel-type.description: The brightness channel allows to control the brightness of a device. It is also possible to switch the device on and off.

channel-type.label: Color Temperature
channel-type.description: The color temperature channel allows to set the color temperature of a light from 0 (cold) to 100 (warm).

channel-type.label: State
channel-type.description: The On/Off channel allows to switch the device on or off.

channel-type.label: Identify
channel-type.description: The Identify channel triggers the identification precedure of the device. How the device identifies itself depends on the device. For lights it is common to flsh a couple of times.

channel-type.label: Reset
channel-type.description: The Reset channel triggers a reset of the device. The device will delete all its stored network information and is tha able to join another open ZigBee network.
